name: ～ Innocent Stuck-up Girls! ～ 肉食ギャルは清純派！？
name_original: ～ Innocent Stuck-up Girls! ～ 肉食ギャルは清純派！？
description:
"肉食ギャルは清純派！？ ～ Innocent Stuck-up Girls! ～" is a visual novel game in which depending on the actions of the protagonist, the gals can become either stuck-up or pure as he tries to enjoys his school life.
This Bishojo Game originally released in 2018 under the "Gold Drip" brand has been reworked for the "PandaShojo" platform to be enjoyed by players of different ages worldwide.

◆Introduction

"Gals huh..."
Transferred to a school rampant with gals.
Because of one friendly gal, the protagonist becomes a little suspicious.
Gals are just playing around... right?

◆Synopsis

The protagonist Shoma Miyagishi moves frequently due to his parent's work.
The new school had a lot of gals, and Shoma, who felt uncomfortable around them, thought he would not be able to fit in right away.
But he inevitably had to interact with them because of the large number in the school.

One time, there was a word that stuck in a conversation I had with a gal.
―― At our school, you can just play around with one after another!

"Play around with one after another..."
Shoma is concerned about whether the gal is just behaving like her image or not, as he grows closer to the heroine...

◆Characters


A very cheerful girl who is the center of attention in her class.
She is the first heroine to talk to Shoma on the day of his transfer, and the reason why Shoma became interested in gals.
She has a mysterious charm that draws people in, and is a good speaker and listener.
But rumors are always around that she has a boyfriend...


A heroine with tanned skin and dyed hair who looks like a deliquent and a gal.
She starts talking to Shoma after bumping into him in the hallway.
Men are afraid of her due to her rough personality, but she actually has a gentle side as well.
Perhaps she has a reason for becoming a deliquent...


A gal with a relaxed and calm personality who speaks in a self-important manner.
She became friends with Shoma after he helped look for something she dropped.
She is an airhead who is adored by the girls around her.
On the other hand, it is rumored among the boys that she is deceiving them...

・Shoma Miyagishi
An very average male student.
He transfers schools frequently due to his parent's work.
Although he was originally uncomfortable with gals, he inevitably became friends with them because of the large number in the school.
